newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: EEI says full-yr net seen at 250 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: EEI says full-yr net seen at 250 mln pesos.

text.p: Construction and engineering concern EEI Corp said on Thursday it expects its net profit for 1996 to reach 250 million pesos compared with 175.5 million pesos in 1995.

In the same disclosure to the Philippine Stock Exchange, EEI reported a revised net profit figure of 87.7 million pesos for the first half of 1996, 39.4 percent higher than the year-ago period of 62.9 million pesos.
It had earlier reported in August a net profit of 82.5 million pesos for the first six months. The company did not give a reason for the revised figures.
EEI said turnover in the first half of the year was 3.7 billion pesos versus the year ago 2.4 billion pesos.
